metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15569 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
PlayerGeneric.cpp in MilkyTracker through 1.02.00 has a use-after-free in the PlayerGeneric destructor.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

milkytracker - 1.02.00+dfsg-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: milkytracker package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.02.00+dfsg-2.1').
